dialogue_turns.text: And speaking of Mayweather, this kind of, like, fills the void that HBO left, right? I mean, HBO was the home for boxing for *decades*.

dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: But HBO announced last month that it would end its coverage of boxing at the end of 2018.
